DETROIT-- Chrysler reported a$ 199 million net loss for the fourth quarter of 2010, but excluding interest on its government loans and other restructuring debts, it earned a$ 198 million operating profit. What Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne said.`` However, our job is not yet done.
